content: Implement binance_book_top.py - WebSocket depth@100ms → TOB + 10bps depth → Redis
Implement liquidations_multi.py - Binance/OKX/Bybit liquidations → Redis Stream
Implement bybit_oi_funding.py - 1-min poll OI + funding → Redis Stream
Create /app/backend/routers/guards.py - read from Redis, replace mock values
Wire guards endpoint to Redis Streams with 5s cache
Test: All workers streaming to Redis → Guards endpoint returning live data
Phase 3 Sprint 1 MVP: Guards live + workers operational
